data.text: Zɔɓe gooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma:
«Wa yɛsu kpɔ̀lɔzu eyɛsu yeelɛ?
Ná zeizu ɠɛa puu, wo ɗa kìgi zupu!
Ni kàkagɛ, nà-kaka fai ma ɠasɔi ɠa la ùnma.
Ni wɔun wa kaana ga wo vizɔgɛ bà,
à suɠwɛɛ ga GALA ka é tòsuʋɛ ɠoloɠologai,
Ni nà kpee loona suɲɔu vai laalɔɠɔma, nu nɔpɛ ge la gòoɠaaʋotesu.
GALA ge pelei leʋeni tùɠɔ, gè la zooni gè ʋa leʋe.
É ɓaazeɠeni mà,
É tòka mini-o-mini, ta nà ga li.
Ná-ziiɠaawanai lokoleʋeni dàalɔɠɔma.
Ná-kɔɔɓɔgiti pilɛgɛ pelei ma ʋɔɔma,
«É nà-nu ɓɔɔɓɔgiti maaɠoozani bà.
Nà-nu ɓɔɔɓɔgiti ti ɠɛlɛni bà,
Nà-pɛlɛ wu nuiti ta nà-botiɠɛ anzanuiti ɓɔɠɔi,
Nà nà-botiɠɛ zunui lolisu, é la gòoɠaaʋotega,
Dàaʋɛ makugi ɠa ɠulazu ànzai ɓɔɠɔi zokpai zu.
Anɛɛ doungoiti ti ɠɛlɛa bà.
Bɔ̀ɔlaiti kpein ta luazu bà.
Gè vɔa ɠae ma,
À màawɔinɠa, à màawɔinɠa, wɔiti wo ga bɔ̀ɔlaiti!
Leeni vaa zu wo ʋilɛsu pòlu, eɠɛʋelei GALA ge ʋilɛsu da pòlu?
«Ee, ni nui ta ɠa dàawooiti sɛʋɛ!
Ti zoo ti kɔlu ɠaazoɓagi zeɠe, ti sɛʋɛ la fasai ma,
Gè kwɛɛ gè ɠɛ ùnmɔɔ nui ɠa vulua,
Niima ɓusɛi ɠoloɠologa ʋoluma,
Nà ka nà ɓɔɠɔi ga gàazuʋɛ.
Wa ɓɔɠɔ ɠaazaɠasu ga, gá ʋilɛ polu ɠale?
À lua boɠa zɔkpɔi ʋa,
